QueryResult.text: SELECT S.PRJ_OBJECT_ID RESOURCE_ID, S.SLICE_DATE FACT_DATE, S.SLICE AVAILABLE_HOURS, tmp.ETC_HOURS, tmp.ACTUAL_HOURS, tmp.BASE_HOURS, tmp.ALLOCATED_HOURS FROM PRJ_BLB_SLICES S JOIN PRJ_BLB_SLICEREQUESTS SR ON (S.SLICE_REQUEST_ID = SR.ID AND SR.REQUEST_NAME = 'DAILYRESOURCEAVAILCURVE') JOIN SRM_RESOURCES RES ON S.PRJ_OBJECT_ID = RES.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN NBI_R_PRT_FACTS_V tmp ON tmp.RESOURCE_ID= S.PRJ_OBJECT_ID AND tmp.FACT_DATE=S.SLICE_DATE WHERE RES.INCLUDE_FLAG=1 -- 1->Indicates a resource should be included in datamart extraction.
